Reviews.Title: “4 nights in Rome could have been better”
Reviews.Author: lucky817
Reviews.Content: wife returned 4 night stay rome following 4 night stay paris unpleasent experience staying hotel begin im usually write reviews read lot dont usually write decided staying ill start stuff actually hotel rooftop garden terrace garden terrace 4th floor actually nice wifi terrace wife italian beer little market store 2 3 doors cheap 140 euros 40 ounce bottle restaurants charge 5 7 euros bottle relax check emails etc market store little market store looks butcher shop fresh meats etc sell cheap soft drinks water beerwine snacks handy quick cheap drink snack hotel doesnt provide bad bed location ok 5 minute walk vatican walls 10 minute walk fromt nearest metro stop street surrounding neighborhood doesnt exactly feel safe bed worst slept rock hard sleeping yoga mat weather beautiful 70s day low 60s night reason warm window closed window noise trucks scooters zipping road echo walls buildings annoying roar window noise window closed sweating nighti didnt chose worser evils air conditioning proceeded feel idiot desk manager ac month june continuing push issue thier policy charge 10 euros night ac desk manager nicer chore bring ac remote controller key hotel key awkward attached return front desk leaving returning everytime leave hotel sometimes chore especially leaving understand hotel thier safe especially hotel shares building company invest card key technology hotels nowadays shower actually spacious european hotel bathroom shower shower door cracked previous occupant knee arm trying wash themselves waterpressure nice water switch warm scolding hot warning service desk managers stay nice helpful rude try shoo quickly understand language barrier difficult sometimes speak nonnative language tourists rude customers dont concern feel welcome overall rome wonderful bursting history charm somewhat confusing difficult navigate usually hotel home base feel safe obtain info trip easier dont expect hotel

Reviews.Content: stopped rome 2 nights quick 7 night italy trip found hotel orbitzcom 2 nightgood price read reviews tripadvisor booked cheap rate orbitz location opted taxi fco airport 20euro honestly looking save train fco train station rome line metro 1euro stop metro stop 12 min walk bad hotel 5 min walk st location free wifi 4th floor againits free cares 4th floor offers beautiful solarium outdoor garden ivy sunset view honestly sunset view rome vittoriano sunset view 4th floor 1st floor floor clean showers complaints paid recommend truly visit rome day fridge doorman cafeteria hotel feather pillows againwe paid appx 30pp usd front desk 2 excellent cool map circled visit eat walking distance walking 2nd nature literally walked everywherefrom colosseum hotel 1hr stops alot rome night spanish steps cool metro home close 12am worth 1euro buses near metro stop 1 euro ok alot traffic remember ride buses buy ticket cant jump pay driver nyc mind lol enjoy rome

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel in a good location”
Reviews.Author: Jessica C
Reviews.Content: location 2 minutes castel sant angelo 5 mins st peters basilica quiet safe connected centre bus 40 bus stop corner hotel grocery shop nearby coffee snack service cleanliness triple nicely decorated spacious goodsized bathroom 4th floor quiet hotel hear traffic noise breakfast coffeemaking facilities available 2 faults staff helpful available 247 clean towels changed everyday plugs available charge phones cameras loaned adapter nice terrace 4th floor terms value hotel value money paid 321 euros exc city tax 4 nights triple leave luggage rest day checkout

Reviews.Title: “Basic, but good roof terrace”
Reviews.Author: Jen L
Reviews.Content: overall hotel ok basic location roof terrace services yourself coffee paying hotel annoying recommend taking travel kettle coffee tea wake leaving hotel morning 5 days probably prefer hotel basic facilities time thats overall staff friendly easy walk roof terrace chill bottle wine day exploring ideal

Reviews.Title: “Value for money”
Reviews.Author: Dids84
Reviews.Content: stayed 5 nights highly recommend staying dont forget 2 star hotel dont expecting red carpet clean cleaned daily bed tv reception staff pleasent helpful perfect location excellent 2 blocks st peters short stroll city book ont disappointed ate restaurant road left hotel recommend beautiful pizza busy worth booking jump queue tickets vatican queues ive seen sooooo paying door booked online company dark rome ate restaurant ad hoc look online service ive food super booked online people door enjoy rome amazing

Reviews.Title: “An excellent 2 star hotel,”
Reviews.Author: Apostolis_11
Reviews.Content: stayed 10 nights single comfortable basic doesnt care breakfast safety boxes etc clean absolutely decent bathroom perfect location near foot public transportations subwaymetro buses eat buy food reachable foot stay

Reviews.Title: “Pro's outweigh the Con's”
Reviews.Author: Cirkz
Reviews.Content: hotel 5 stars location basic expect sleep pros location lift free wifi top floor shower price cons miserable staff breakfast tv issue air con charged 10 euros day fridge safe slightly dirty

Reviews.Title: “Close to Everything”
Reviews.Author: SIGNALS123
Reviews.Content: hotel location five minute walk st peters museum clean little terrace fourth floor provided space enjoy wifi access coffee shop street adequate

Reviews.Title: “Perfect For Us”
Reviews.Author: Caperman
Reviews.Content: family 4 teens stayed night cruise hotel location mentioned blocks vatican lots shops restaurants nearby handled easily double bed 2 singles bathroom clean spacious overall pleasant stay return rome try stay

Reviews.Title: “Nice solarium, close to the Vatican”
Reviews.Author: Helard
Reviews.Content: close vatican 3 blocks visit night crowds little metro station probably due lack metro lines rome soon apparently time start digging metro line ruins close restaurants supermarket groceries

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location, clean and comfortable”
Reviews.Author: Susiepepper
Reviews.Content: stayed adriatic easter 2011 location middle vatican castel san angelo 10 minutes remembering 2 star hotel isnt glitzy comfortable safe clean shower bathroom fresh towels day basically catered

Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfortable and helpful”
Reviews.Author: carmelita67
Reviews.Content: traveled children aged 10 14 elderly father hotel easy 40 bus termini walled archway sign post hotel ahead hotel meters lift walk steps reception floor soon checked gentleman street map circled popular landmarks told bus didnt realise close clean comfortable decorated budget hotel beds towels changed fourth floor access nice roof garden hotel easy walking distance st peters square castle sant angelo restaurants coffee shopsa minimarket wonderful deli gift shops buses trams metro enjoyable stay staff met friendly helpful definitely return hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great position and good value”
Reviews.Author: paul409
Reviews.Content: 4 nights stay rome excellent position stay rome vatican doorstep easy access attractions hotel clean comfortable service reception staff beds changed twice stay clean towels day shame breakfast excellent cafe road serving coffee cakes reasonable prices excellent local family run restaurant road cafe called porto castello recommend hotel value position book

Reviews.Title: “great value for the money”
Reviews.Author: akp_va
Reviews.Content: 50 dollars heart rome pleasantly pleased location staff balcony bathroom blocks vatican metro line doesnt spend lot time money hotel

Reviews.Content: bad hard nights sleep hotel hot loud throughout night october rome hot nights unable sleep windows noise street below ac told time cost 10euros night hotel noisey night mosty due guests coming drunk 230am screaming hallways thin walls loud doors leaky pipes help sightseeing rome days tiring nights sleep enjoying trip hotel failed wished spent money hotel enjoyed trip clean location

Reviews.Title: “Adriatic Hotel”

Reviews.Content: hotel wonderful fabulous fabio help told eat bus bed little hard location highly recommend hotel time travelers walking distance vatican sites frank tina

Reviews.Title: “Definitely a no frills experience”

Reviews.Content: expectations hotel sorry hoped little plus clean air con effective 5 minutes walk vatican city minutes castel santangelo barely bed couldnt wardobe door due lack space bathroom loo basin shower unpacking dressing etc normal size apart bed wardrobe hanging rail table chair shelves drawers shirts undies stayed suitcase street noise loud uninterrupted sleep window metal shutters closed live main road uk traffic noise night neighbourhood fine experience rome night choice bars restaurants spending day walking wonderful sights 30 minute walk centre city 2 star hotel bad basic hotel euros stay rome central

Reviews.Title: “Super Value...Close to Vatican, bus stop, great restaurants...clean and secure”
Reviews.Author: cagoba25
Reviews.Content: stayed close vatican cheap brother nice twin beds clean bathroom key leave buzz hotel rooftop patio nice relaxing vantage views hotel noisy motorized shutters close darkening noise reduction nice clean frills cheap stay 5 minute walk 40 bus express town 10 min leisurely walk st peters street borgo pio spelling restaurant amazing food chefowner touristy restaurants

Reviews.Title: “Good location, Clean & Inexpensive”
Reviews.Author: imjilyan
Reviews.Content: hotel simple basic frills ac free internet location near vatican bus routes staff mediocre didnt didnt matter adorable roof nice lounge chairs flowers treat sitting relaxing bread cheese loves nice breeze simply stay worth paid e100 euro nite

Reviews.Title: “Excellent budget hotel with very helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: Florence054
Reviews.Content: booked hotel price reviews rome city major attractions distance hotel staff useful information local buses 1 euro single trip lots cheap restaurants nearby weather hot paid extra air conditioning hotel noisy road wasnt window bathroom fairly adequate definitely recommend short budget stay

Reviews.Title: “A pleasant surprise during our trip in Europe”
Reviews.Author: Easygoing47
Reviews.Content: booked hotel march 2010 based reviewers comments disappointed triple decent size comfortable beds nice furniture stateoftheart clean bathroom balcony access nice terrace hotels roof else nice hotel staff helped luggage checked care taxi reservation airport 160 euros day season view perfect hotel short trip rome hotel located 300 meters st peter 200 meters castle san angelo 100 meters pedestrian street restaurants 300 meters fancy commercial street basically id anytime

Reviews.Title: “No frills, but clean, in a great location, and at a great price”
Reviews.Author: SteveZS
Reviews.Content: adequate hotel staff courteous helpful responsive light flickering annoyingly bathroom fixed immediately location excellent midst romantic streets movies frills mirror bedroom wardrobe closet broken usable price location superb staff friendly available

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel for the price - no internet in room.”
Reviews.Author: Karen9999999
Reviews.Content: 10 days rome hotel adriatic staff nice friendly spoke english clean okay size tv expected rome bathroom okay size shower shower hard constant reasonable temperature location depending plan rome hotel little closer popular piazza maybe wifi wifi hotel lobby wifi plan sit loveseat lobbyfront desk

Reviews.Title: “Friendly and Helpful”

Reviews.Content: night stay hotel found bit short break staff reception friendly helpful street noise shutter bad metro walking lot time attractions apart

Reviews.Title: “Good Budget Hotel”
Reviews.Author: raoul88
Reviews.Content: paid 55 euro taxi 3 pax luggage bit airport hotelthe hotel nice close vatican couple restaurants nearby pizza restaurant corner pizza evening 10 euro termini 8 euro spanish steps taxi metro 10 min walk safe hotel security spacious 3 adults bit noisy night windows budget hotel price

Reviews.Title: “Stay Here”
Reviews.Author: Michelle71
Reviews.Content: stayed days march understand hotel 2 stars huge 79 beds spotless stayed hotels rated 4 stars wasnt nice theres tv fridge survive whilst short trip rome staff friendly recommendation somehwere eat sent food minutes walk st peters square leisurely walk main sites supermarkets didnt public transport walked aid map reception definitely recommend

Reviews.Content: truly lovely staying adriatic hotel atmosphere cheerful service hotel designed typical italian city style personally view seen fantastic view city romantic expensive paid easy click travel web site 70 night easy lovely rome internet access air condition tv cables facilities highly recommend surely stay time rome
